data.message: Excited to share that Jeremie Miller, Simon Murtha-Smith and I (Singly) closed our seed funding with an awesome partner (David Pakman) + great angels on Monday and then won Judges' Choice at the Strata Conference last night!  Thanks for all the support/friendship/intros/help!

data.name: NY Tech Meetup
data.caption: www.livestream.com
data.description: NY Tech Meetup on Livestream. Founded in 2004 by Scott Heiferman, the NY Tech Meetup has over 8,000 members, representing people from all parts of the New York technology community. - Watch live streaming Internet TV.  Broadcast your own live streaming videos, like NY Tech Meetup in Widescreen HD. L...

data.message: Excited to be demoing Introspectr at the New York Tech Meetup tomorrow night! http://bit.ly/dsRxQx for tickets (more going on sale in the next few hours). Also, sign up for the beta at http://www.introspectr.com.
